metadata.Title: CalculateSoilTemperature
metadata.Extended description: Calculation of minimum and maximum Soil temperature, Further used in shoot temperature estimate.
metadata.Short description: Calculate minimum and maximum soil temperature and update deep layer temperature.

init.name: Init
init.firstLine: public void Init(INRA.SiriusQualitySoilT.Interfaces.DeepLayerStates deeplayerstates, INRA.SiriusQualitySoilT.Interfaces.DeepLayerStates deeplayerstates1, INRA.SiriusQualitySoilT.Interfaces.Exogenous exogenous, INRA.SiriusQualitySoilT.Interfaces.RatesExternal ratesexternal, INRA.SiriusQualitySoilT.Interfaces.States states)

process.name: CalculateModel
process.description: Calculates minimum and maximum soil temperatures and updates the deep layer temperature based on exogenous inputs, external heat flux and the parameter lambda_.

inputs.name: lambda_
inputs.description: Latente heat of water vaporization at 20°C

inputs.name: exogenous_maxTAir
inputs.description: Maximum Air Temperature from Weather Files

inputs.name: exogenous_minTAir
inputs.description: Minimum Air Temperature from Weather files

inputs.name: ratesexternal_heatFlux
inputs.description: Soil Heat Flux from Energy Balance Component

inputs.name: deeplayerstates_deepLayerT
inputs.description: Temperature of the last soil layer

outputs.name: deeplayerstates_deepLayerT
outputs.description: Temperature of the last soil layer

functions.name: SoilMinimumTemperature
functions.description: Computes minimum soil temperature as the minimum of SoilTempA (energy-based estimate) and SoilTempB (mean of min air and deep temperature).

functions.name: SoilMaximumTemperature
functions.description: Computes maximum soil temperature as the maximum of SoilTempA (energy-based estimate) and SoilTempB (mean of min air and deep temperature).

functions.name: UpdateTemperature
functions.description: Updates deep layer temperature by smoothing: newTemperature = (9*oldTemperature + meanDailySoilTemp) / 10.
